game.title: Retrieve the Lost Scroll
game.objective: Recover a lost scroll from the ancient ruins.
game.description: The village elder has lost a valuable scroll and needs it back to complete a ritual. The scroll was last seen near the ancient ruins, but be careful - the ruins are treacherous, and you won't be alone.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and the villager's gratitude

task.description: Search every room in the ancient ruins for any sign of the lost scroll. Be careful not to trigger any traps or alarms.

task.objective: Retrieve the scroll from the treasure chest.
task.description: Use your wits to open the locked treasure chest and retrieve the scroll. Be careful, as the chest may be trapped or guarded.

task.objective: Return to the village elder with the scroll.
task.description: Make your way back to the village and return the scroll to the villager. They will be grateful, and you'll receive your reward.
